book.title: Venusaur
book.funfact: Venusaur is the heaviest of the Kanto starter Pokémon
book.Evolution: Venusaur evolves from Ivysaur at level 32. It can mega evolve into Mega Venusaur using the Venusaurite.

book.title: Charizard
book.funfact: If Charizard becomes angry, the flame at the tip of their tail can flare up in a whitish-blue color.
book.Evolution: Charizard evolves from Charmeleon starting at level 36. It is the final form of Charmander.

book.title: Butterfree
book.funfact: It's easy to not realize that Butterfree was Ash's second creature caught after Pikachu.
book.Evolution: Butterfree evolves from Metapod at level 10 and is the final evolution of Caterpie.

book.title: Beedrill
book.funfact: It's thought that Beedrill are not based off of bees, but the Asian Giant Hornet.
book.Evolution: Beedrill is the final evolution of Weedle and evolves from Kakuna at level 10. Beedrill gains a Mega Evolution in Omega Ruby and Alpha Sapphire.

book.title: Fearow
book.funfact: Fearow resembles anhingas, long-necked birds which spear prey with their beaks.
book.Evolution: Fearow evolves from Spearow at level 20.

book.title: Nidoqueen
book.funfact: Nidorina and Nidoqueen are sterile,means that if a Nidoking wants to breed, he has to do it with the young Nidoran-female.
book.Evolution: Nidoqueen is the evolved form of a Nidorina by use of a Moon Stone, and is the final form of a Nidoran.

book.title: Venomoth
book.funfact: Out of the first generation Bug Pokémon, Venomoth has the highest base Special Attack and ties with Scyther for the highest base HP.
book.Evolution: Venomoth is the evolved form of Venonat as of level 31.

book.title: Wigglytuff
book.funfact: Their fur, in fact, is so supple that it is said if two Wigglytuff were to hug, they would never let each other go of each other because they themselves cannot get enough of their own fur.
book.Evolution: Wigglytuff is the evolved form of Jigglypuff by the use of a Moon Stone. Wigglytuff is the final form of Igglybuff.

book.title: Jynx
book.funfact: Jynx originally had a male counterpart based on a yeti, as well as the Kaiju Woo from Ultraman.
book.Evolution: Jynx is the evolved form of Smoochum as of level 30.
